ComicInfo.Series: Evil Dead 2: Tales of the Ex-Mortis
ComicInfo.Summary:
Soul Power Part 2 of 3Don Simmons is in CIA custody for being caught meeting with Afzal Abd-Apep a known terrorist in Baghdad. Don convinces the agents to let him speak to Afzal whose is possessed by a demon and may know the whereabouts of the Ex-Morits. The demon inside Afzal tells Don he doesn't know where the book is but if Don helps him escape he can help him sell his soul to get the love of Britney. Don helps him and the demon is transferred into a CIA agent and the pair escape the compound easily.
The Lottery Part 2 of 2Ishme is face to face with the Demon Dagan. He kills Dagan and brings rain to his home once again.
Scream Queen Beauty Pageant Queen Sable takes her team to a quiet cabin to get prepared for the Miss Galaxy Pageant. One of the team finds a page from the Ex-Mortis and when he reads it he becomes possessed. Sable kills him, and when the demon transfers from one person to the other Sable is forced to kill her whole team.
Gather 'round ye groovy Ash lovers for an Evil Dead O'Ween treat: the new Evil Dead "Ash-thology" goes all out for a demonic holiday. The companion to Evil Dead 2: Beyond Dead By Dawn calls forth three Ash-centric stories of Deadites, ghouls, monsters, and more. Featuring terrifying tales by writers Justin Peniston, Frank Hannah and Jeff Mariotte & Marsheila Rockwell with art Gabriel Rearte, Eder Messias, and Enza Fontana.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-11-19 11:05:42. [Issue ID 505032]
